nodes.bodyText: Elsewhere in this class, this field is assigned when the user wants to subscribe to methods. When not null, this layer assumes that it is already subscribed. So setting this value to null again allows users to subscribe to methods again later if they re-register
MessageCallback allows for us and users to set the callback to null, but methods and twin do not, hence the need for these new markTwin/MethodAsUnsubscribed methods
